title: udaanCapital ties up with Northern Arc Capital for financing 50,000 kiranas - Business Standard
content: udaanCapital ties up with Northern Arc Capital for financing 50,000 kiranas  Business Standard
description: udaanCapital currently helps disburse over Rs 8,000 crore credit a year to 150,000 kiranas and small businesses. The credit is short-term and ranges from Rs 10,000 to Rs 25 lakh
